abstract: Swiss Re, the world’s second-biggest reinsurer, boosted its capital by around $3 billion, making the company think it can repay a costly convertible loan from billionaire Warren E. Buffett and regain a key AA credit rating.
snippet: Swiss Re, the world’s second-biggest reinsurer, boosted its capital by around $3 billion, making the company think it can repay a costly convertible loan from billionaire Warren E. Buffett and regain a key AA credit rating.
lead_paragraph: Swiss Re, the world’s second-biggest reinsurer, boosted its capital by around $3 billion, giving it confidence it can repay a costly convertible loan from billionaire Warren E. Buffett and regain a key credit rating.

headline.main: Swiss Re Confident It Can Repay Buffett
